name: makeStreamingContentKeyRequestData(forApp:contentIdentifier:options:completionHandler:)
desc: Obtains encrypted key request data for a specific combination of app and content.
declaration:

                      contentIdentifier: Data?, 
                                options: [String : Any]? = nil, 
                      completionHandler handler: @escaping (Data?, Error?) -> Void)
